title: Build a Flipkart-style clothing e-commerce application

requirements.text: Replace the existing dairy product catalog with a clothing product catalog. Products should include clothing items across categories (Men, Women, Kids, Accessories). Each product must display an image, name, brand, description, price, original price (for discount display), size options, and a rating. Seed the backend with at least 20 default clothing products across all categories.

quotes: i want to build an application where i can sell clothes as flipkart does

acceptanceCriteria: At least 20 clothing products are displayed in the catalog on first load
Each product card shows image, name, brand, price, original price with discount %, and star rating
Products span at least 4 categories: Men, Women, Kids, Accessories
Backend stores and returns clothing-specific fields (brand, sizes, category, rating, originalPrice)

requirements.text: Add category-based filtering and a search bar to the product catalog. Users should be able to filter products by category (Men, Women, Kids, Accessories) and search by product name or brand. Filters and search should work together.
acceptanceCriteria: A category filter bar or sidebar is visible on the catalog page
Clicking a category filters the product grid to only show matching items
A search input filters products by name or brand as the user types
Search and category filter can be applied simultaneously
An 'All' option resets category filter

requirements.text: Implement a product detail view (modal or page) that opens when a user clicks on a product card. It should show the full product image, name, brand, description, available sizes, price, discount, rating, and an 'Add to Cart' button with size selection.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a product card opens a detail view
Detail view shows all product fields including available sizes
User can select a size before adding to cart
Add to Cart button is disabled until a size is selected
Detail view can be closed to return to the catalog

requirements.text: Update the shopping cart to support clothing-specific attributes. Each cart item should display the selected size alongside the product name, image, price, and quantity controls. Cart total should reflect quantities and apply any discounts.
acceptanceCriteria: Cart items display selected size
Cart shows discounted price and original price with strike-through when applicable
Quantity controls (+ / -) work correctly
Cart total updates dynamically based on quantity and price
Remove item button removes the product from the cart

requirements.text: Redesign the entire application with a Flipkart-inspired visual theme: clean white backgrounds, bold orange and blue accent colors, card-based product grid layout, prominent header with logo and search bar, and a professional e-commerce feel. Replace all DairyDelight branding with StyleMart. Update the page title and document title to StyleMart.
acceptanceCriteria: Application name is 'StyleMart' in the header logo
Document/page title is 'StyleMart'
Color scheme uses white, orange, and blue accents consistent with a modern e-commerce platform
Header includes logo, search bar, and cart icon with item count
Product grid uses card-style layout with hover effects
No DairyDelight or dairy-related branding remains

requirements.text: Ensure the application is fully mobile-responsive with a layout optimized for phone screens. The product grid should adapt from 1 column on mobile to 2-3 columns on tablet and 4 columns on desktop. The header search bar and navigation should collapse gracefully on small screens.
acceptanceCriteria: Product grid shows 1 column on mobile, 2 on tablet, 4 on desktop
Header is usable on screens as small as 320px wide
Cart and checkout pages are readable and functional on mobile
Touch targets are large enough for mobile use (min 44px)

requirements.text: Render the generated clothing product images and the StyleMart logo as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated. Use these images on product cards, the hero banner, and the header logo.
acceptanceCriteria: All product images load from /assets/generated/ directory
StyleMart logo appears in the header
Hero banner image is displayed on the catalog page
No broken image links appear in the product grid

constraints: All backend logic must remain in a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo
Do not edit files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Generated images must be served from frontend/public/assets/generated, not through the backend
nonGoals: Real payment processing or Stripe integration
User authentication or login (no Internet Identity required for this build)
